title: The Carrots Sprouted
author: Danny Alan
detail:
After a number of days (5 to be exact) of hard labour, watering and checking our carrots, Cobe has this morning found the first carrot has sprouted!

Proud as punch shouting at me from across the house as if there was an utter emergency, I was summoned to the front room windowsill to find the fruits of this little lad's labour sat for all to see.

You can see just how happy he is from his picture at his first vegetable growing.

Great work Cobes, I'm looking forward to the cactus seeds arriving soon so we can sow those too.
